Keywords: Celebrity , Soldier
Real Name: John Walker
Special Powers
(+5 POINTS) MAN WITH A PLAN: John Walker Captain America starts the game with the Disney+ #s002 Captain America's Shield equipped.
STRIPPED OF YOUR TITLE AND AUTHORITY AS CAPTAIN AMERICA: When John Walker Captain America KO's an opposing character, after resolutions if he is equipped with Disney+ #s002 Captain America's Shield, you may remove it from the game. If you do, this game modify John Walker Captain America's combat values +1 and he can use Battle Fury, Steal Energy.
I JUST WANT TO DO THE JOB: Charge, Flurry, Leap/Climb.
THE NEW CAPTAIN AMERICA: Energy Shield/Deflection, Toughness.
Trade John Walker Captain America Want John Walker Captain America

Comments
June 1, 2022
Bobcat2022
Now this is a cute, flavorful reason to make the shield an equipment instead of just part of the dial. Wish you had to instead drop the shield, or choose an opposing character to equip it to, or something, but yeah it's fun. Pokolo, you make a good point: kinda weird they included Batroc in this set but not Battlestar. I guess Marvel's not trying to sell toys of characters with "authentic on-screen tragic-ending action!" I have beef with this character because I think the show vastly over-sold his heel turn if they were going to give him another face turn in the finale, but the actual dial in game terms is fine.
May 26, 2022
pokolo
He’s a beast… missed opportunity not giving him a Battlestar bystander to generate at the beginning of the game though.
May 4, 2022
Goop
Even though i hate ESD with charge the rest of his dial makes up for it. If you can get a ko with him and get ALL your stats up +1 he is a beast for 75pts. 12/4 through most of his dial steal energy + flurry the whole way. YIKES. You DO have to get a ko with him though.
April 18, 2022
Novashotgunner
An incredibly complex and unique character that is not only worthy of the mantle but also this incredible dial! He hits like a truck and it only ramps up from there. A+ wizkids this figure feels like you pulled him right off the screen!
